document.full_text: the s.e.c.'s new rules give corporate employees a reason to bypass internal compliance programs and report directly to the government in the hope of reaping a financial windfall.
document.title: a greater incentive for whistle-blowers
lines_and_colors: the s.e.c.'s new rules give corporate employees a reason to bypass internal compliance programs and report directly to the government in the hope of reaping a financial windfall.
